title: Ronaldo to Atleti?
description:
Cristiano Ronaldo could go on loan to Atletico Madrid, but only if they can offload Griezmann to United in the process. Would it be a good move for all parties? Stewart Robson sits down with Thomas Muller to talk about all thing Bayern Munich. And Erik Ten Hag is furious at a preseason game while Conte is furious at Nagelsmann.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Ronaldo is linked to Atletico Madrid; we sit down with Thomas Muller; Ten Hag sounds off
